title: Epic: Minimal Prelude
body:
Research and implement a minimal Prelude. Needs: basic types (Bool, Int, Char, String, Maybe, Either, IO, lists), core functions (id, const, map, filter, foldr, foldl), basic type classes (Eq, Ord, Show, Read, Num, Monad). Research existing trimmed-down Preludes from teaching compilers.

**Key decisions**: #12, #13 in DESIGN.md
